original_text: And it shall come to pass, that the nation and kingdom which will not serve the same Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon, and that will not put their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon, that nation will I punish, saith the Lord, with the sword, and with the famine, and with the pestilence, until I have consumed them by his hand.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살을 섬기지 아니하며 그 목으로 바벨론의 왕의 멍에를 메지 아니하는 백성과 나라는 내가 그들이 멸망하기까지 칼과 기근과 전염병으로 그 민족을 벌하리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
which will not serve Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕 느부갓네살을 섬기지 않을 것은

sentences.original_text: and that will not put their neck under yoke of king of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바빌론 왕의 멍에를 목에 두지 않을 것은

sentences.original_text: with sword, and with famine, and with pestilence
until I have consumed them by his hand
